alert.note: Alert for Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 22 at 4:37PM PDT until March 22 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range
